state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to try to head east. With that over with, move north. And then, go north. And then, go to the north. After that, attempt to move west. And then, head west. With that accomplished, attempt to travel north. And then, venture north. After that, go west. And then, travel west. Next, try to travel north. Then, try to venture west. After that, make an effort to move south. Once you finish that, make an attempt to head west. With that over with, lift the coin from the floor of the basement. Got that? Good! -= Bedroom =- You arrive in a bedroom. An usual one. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
